name: Pixel Gunsmith[beta1.2.2]
description:
A small game where you take contracts to build guns for money, but there's a catch. Each contract will have a shorter time limit and more obscure instructions to test your knowledge of pixel gun parts. Or freely create your own cool arsenal with so many parts to chose from and share it!

The contract system isn't ready yet so for now enjoy creative mode with 4 guns and over 170 parts! Bug: Foregrip buttons are sometimes finicky depending on what handguard you have(especially bad for the OK74)

Thanks to Sky for the Scar-17 and the shotgun(wip)

Planned things:
  • Contracts(they're being a bit of a pain right now which is why there isn't any)
  • MP5, Glock, SKS, Kriss Vector,  MK14,  SVD and a Mosin are confirmed
  • Save feature with multiple "loadouts"
  • Lasers and laser packs 
  • A more interesting photo mode maybe with more controls/options
  • Mac support
  • Android support
